snippet: The Armory Show, at Piers 92 and 94, is split into two sections, one devoted to 20th-century art, the other to 21st.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews The Armory Show, which is split into sections devoted to 20th-century art and 21st-century art, at Piers 92 and 94.
lead_paragraph: The Armory Show, at Piers 92 and 94, is split into two sections, one devoted to 20th-century art, the other to 21st.
